body.name: PIOMATIC Steamer for Clothes, Foldable Handheld Clothing Wrinkles Remover for Garments with Thermostatic Ceramic Plate, 30-Second Fast Heat-up, Portable Mini Steamer Iron for 120V Countries
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: [Easy to use] This steamer has 1000 watts of power, preheats in only 30 seconds, and quickly removes wrinkles from clothes for a fresh and pressed appearance with its quilted ceramic plate.
[Foldable and Lightweight] Compact in size and accompanied by a storage bag, PIOMATIC clothes steamer is an ideal travel companion for 120V countries like the USA and Canada.

[Strong Penetrating Steam] This handheld steamer creates strong and long-lasting penetrating steam, and it can quickly remove wrinkles perfectly and keep your clothing, upholstery, curtains and other home fabrics smooth and fresh.
[No Leak Design] This clothes steamer is designed with a unique leakproof, anti-drip and anti-spill technology, enables steaming from any angle without having to worry about leakage.
PIOMATIC garment steamer is designed for 110-125 volts outlet use. Plugging into 220 volts will damage this product.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Quilted Ceramic Plate Get better result and perform like an iron for a fresh pressed look. 100% Leak-proof Water Tank Transparent Detachable 150ml/5.08oz water tank for easier filling and pouring out the remaining water. Extra-Long Cord The 8-foot power cord means you'll never have to worry about remote operation and you can iron your clothes remotely.
1000 watts of power Ready in 30 Seconds No Leaking, No Spilling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for travel, does a great job, light weight and folds up nicely for packing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heats up quickly, practical, lightweight & easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a wedding out of town and it was super useful! I love that where the steam comes out has flat area that can be used as a mini iron on particularly tough wrinkles. I now use it more than my iron at home because it is so much easier to set up and put away. I find that it heats up and cools down pretty quickly, the only thing that would make this better is if it had something to hold it up while not in use instead of having to lay it down sideways.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heats up & works fast
reviews.reviewText: I just test tried a small spot it worked great. On the booklet it said 2 years warranty which is great to know. I was really disappointed that it was delivered late. When it heats up has a funky smell (I’m assuming it’s because of the heat). Something that I’m concerned is the voltage limit on the booklet. It said over 120 voltage can be dangerous but I don’t even know what that means. Then how do they expect me to know when it stays within the recommended voltage. There should be some sort of instructions explaining how we can understand when it goes over 120 voltage. Also the book should contain info on how long can the steamer be on so we can be cautions while in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I just hope it'll keep working for a while. My old steamer just died after a year. I hope this one lasts longer than that. Will update.I love how you have to press the button while steaming because I feel like you don't waste a lot of water. I get to control when the steam starts and when to stop. It is pretty powerful and heats up literally in seconds. I also like the detachable water reservoir. I love that it is shaped like a blow dryer. The size is good. Foldability is also a plus. However, I don't like that it is a challenge when you wanna set it down (like let say you just wanna straighten the clothes briefly), there is nothing to hold it up. Coz I don't like the hot part touching a surface and eventually burning it. Nothing that a small wash cloth/towel can do, but it's just something to think about. It hasn't happened yet. But overall, this steamer gets an A!PS: took this on a cruise ship. As you know steamers are not allowed on cruise ships. But because this looks like a blow dryer (on x-ray machine), it was not confiscated. I did not use it on the cruise (for safety reasons obvi) but was surprised at the number of steamers I saw that were kept at the port and returned to the passengers at the end of the cruise. Not encouraging people to bring steamers on a cruise ship but if you have to, this will probably be your best choice. Not only because it is easy to sneak in (lol) coz it looks like a blow dryer, but also because you won't have to worry about leaving it on because it doesn't steam unless you press the button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesnt work in Europe
reviews.reviewText: Good product used a few times in the US. But ultimately I bought this TRAVEL steamer to use on my trip to Italy. Burned out immediately when used with the converter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Water in small tank lasts a while!
reviews.reviewText: This is super amazing! I thought the water in the small tank wasn't going to last but it does! I was able to do quite a bit of pieces without having to stop every 5 minutes to refill. The best part, you can use it at any angle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good 120v travel steamer
reviews.reviewText: I needed a steamer for a vacation, plus an extra requirement for this to look like a hair dryer in checked luggage (...) and this worked great.Seeing many reviews mentioning low water capacity and others about unit failures, it doesn't take a genious to figure out you shouldn't let this thing run out of water while you're using it. Fill it with water and press + hold the button. Don't let off. On a cold start it may spit water at first. Point it away for 30 seconds or so. Then it works great. It uses half a tank of water for shirts, full tank for suits and full length dresses. And yes stop and refill when it's less than half full or so. No problems. Works fast.This unit needs 120 volts and uses 1000 watts. That means don't try using this for 200v outlets and don't ask about using voltage converters ... for a 1kw appliance! A 1kw voltage converter would be large, heavy, and expensive. If you will have 200v where you are going, please consider buying a 200v unit.Btw I'm switching to this for work trips in the US (120v everywhere here). So much faster than ironing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: I would buy this product again! It is a little heavy if you have to steam a Floor length coat or something that is very wrinkled. I wanted a small steamer and this one fit the bill, you won’t be disappointed.
